title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Chen Lin
raw_text: Cover Art  Big Octopus    I started working on CG in 2005; in 2006 I entered Webzen China as a background designer. In my spare time, I like to paint scientific and fantastic objects, such as aircrafts and aliens. I also like to building models, because I think it could help me understand the structures before I paint them. I love painting and I will keep working on it.
text:
Cover Art
Big Octopus
I started working on CG in 2005; in 2006 I entered Webzen China as a background designer. In my spare time, I like to paint scientific and fantastic objects, such as aircrafts and aliens. I also like to building models, because I think it could help me understand the structures before I paint them. I love painting and I will keep working on it.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Big Octopus by Chen Lin
